description: An Israeli military operation in northern Gaza is overwhelming hospitals but the United Nations and other medical groups were prevented from evacuating patients.
title: U.N. convoy to evacuate patients fails to reach besieged northern Gaza

description: The Dominican Republic’s mass deportation plan, which calls for 10,000 Haitians to be expelled every week, comes amid deteriorating relations between the two countries.
title: Dominican Republic expels over 10,000 Haitians, and plans to do so every week

description: Kim Jong Un has pledged “full support” for Russia’s Putin in his fight against Ukraine. Seoul and Kyiv say he’s now doing that by sending in military personnel.
title: North Korean forces are backing Russia inside Ukraine, officials say

description: The Japanese grassroots movement of atomic bomb survivors from Hiroshima and Nagasaki received the prize for its efforts to achieve a world free of nuclear weapons, the Nobel committee said.
title: Nobel Peace Prize given to Nihon Hidankyo for work to halt nuclear weapons

description: It was the deadliest strike on the city since Oct. 8, 2023, when Hezbollah launched its first rocket attacks on northern Israel.
title: Live updates: Israeli strikes kill 22 in Beirut; Israeli cabinet weighs response to Iran

description: Soldiers with pulverized bones and gunshot wounds have come through these facilities, with many focused on getting back to the front to stop the Russian advance.
title: In recovery centers, Ukrainian soldiers work to get back to the fight

description: The airstrikes are reviving criticism of Israel over its apparent tolerance for high civilian casualties in pursuit of military goals, rights groups say.
title: Israeli airstrikes in Lebanon take heavy toll on civilians

description: Israel’s war of words with the United Nations escalated this week when Israeli forces fired on three positions in Lebanon manned by U.N. peacekeepers.
title: Israel steps up its battles with the United Nations
